skillTree.localised_description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
Such utterly ludicrous, impossible geometry could not conceivably be the product of a sane mind; sight of it drives the untainted mad and melts their brains!

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Ruin subtly corrupts a populace from the very depths of their souls; the resultant favour feeds the Dark Powers' servants and spurs them ever onwards.
Soren is the only Vitki that has King Adella's ear, it is said because he holds a rock Adella believes to be bestowed upon him by Tzeentch. In truth, it's just a rock.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Soren's Sack is filled with enchanted items, artifacts, trinkets and plain junk. You never know what he digs up next.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Soren's Sack"

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: No ordinary hatchlings are the beasts that emerge from Soren's eggs.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10%  for Corrupted Feral Dinosaur units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -20%  for Corrupted Feral Dinosaur units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A true Vitki knows how to use the local flora to craft potions, incantations and spells a like.
The most talented and powerful Seer of the Lustrian continent, Soren holds a special place among the Skeggi.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Corrupted Feral Dinosaur units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Erik Fishbrain was the first raider that set foot on Lustria, Soren claims he carries his Horn in his sack - this in no way to be verified however.
What Soren lacks in mobility the legendary seer makes up in sheer strength.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Chillwind Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Power of Darkness"

skillTree.localised_description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Doombolt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

backgroundSkills.localised_description: None as flatulent as the Legendary Vitki of Skeggi, Soren. His sack holds many gifts and blessings.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
